author: senh
title: Best way to see supermoon? On a Chinese moon-viewing flight
text: BING NEWS: Blood Moon and Supermoon: Chinese airlines running special flights to see sky's stunning night, during Moon Festival "And Moon Festival is an important festival for the Chinese. "We hope the moon-viewing flights will take care of the emotional needs of our customers who are still on the road during the festival." Even if the sky is cloudy on the night of the events ... 09/23/2015 - 1:11 am | View Link Best way to see supermoon? On a Chinese moon-viewing flight It’s a hat trick for moon lovers. This year’s September 27 marks three important lunar events — a supermoon, a total lunar eclipse and Asia’s Mid-Autumn Festival, also known as the Moon Festival. The Moon Festival falls on the 15th day of the ... 09/22/2015 - 2:46 pm | View Link Flights to feature rare supermoon The next convergence will be in 2033. Ctrip, a major Chinese travel agency, said this fact has made moon-viewing flights more popular than usual.
